LanguageData.RV2_CPI_Settings_EnableVorePathConflicts: Prevents preds from engaging in two different vore paths that shouldn't work together. For example, they cannot endo-store one prey in their stomach and digest another at the same time. Forces a vore path switch to the first path if necessary to resolve a conflict.
LanguageData.RV2_CPI_Settings_AllowConflictingManualI: Manual vore interactions (i.e. initiated manually with right click) can be made despite path conflicts. This doesn't prevent the conflict, so the path will still switch when it gets a chance!
LanguageData.RV2_CPI_Settings_AllowGoalSwitchersToPro: Allow goal-switchers to propose conflicting paths
Goal-switching predators (usually from the "Mischievous" quirk) can propose conflicting vore paths. These will switch to be non-conflicting. Applies to both manual and automatic vore.
